sentences.sentence: A method and apparatus for decoding an orthogonally encoded data signal in a noncoherent receiver system.
sentences.translation: 非相干接收系统中对正交编码数据信号进行解码的方法及装置。

sentences.sentence: A research of the effect of rainfall on orthogonally polarized LMDS with line-of-sight transmission has been completed.
sentences.translation: 研究了降雨对视距传输的LMDS正交极化产生的影响。

sentences.sentence: Stress analysis of orthogonally intersecting cylindrical shells usually used in the underground structure is studied in this paper.
sentences.translation: 本文研究地下结构中常用的正交圆柱形岔壳的内力计算。
